sentences.en: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
sentences.cn: 各个家庭按父亲的职业分类。

sentences.en: Gardeners classify plants accrdiring to their life - duration and frost susceptibility.
sentences.cn: 园艺学家根据植物的生命长短以及对霜害的敏感性去分类.

sentences.en: He carefully began to classify the results of his examinations.
sentences.cn: 他开始细心地为他的检验结果分类.

sentences.en: How would you classify these pottery shards -- are they prehistoric?
sentences.cn: 你怎么给这些陶瓷碎片 归类?它们是史前时期的 吗 ?

sentences.en: In their original description these types are morphologically distinct enough to classify them as subspecies.
sentences.cn: 在他们最早的论述中,这些类型在形态上是截然不同的,完全可以把它们分成亚种.

sentences.en: It is entirely proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentences.cn: 把康德化为先驱的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

sentences.en: It is entirly proper to classify Kant as a transcendental idealist.
sentences.cn: 把康德化为先驻的唯心主义者是完全正确的.

sentences.en: It is further helpful to classify aneurysms into saccular and fusiform.
sentences.cn: 更为实用的是把动脉瘤分成囊形和梭形两类.

sentences.en: It is necessary initially to classify the headaches into certain types.
sentences.cn: 首先，必须将头痛分为几个类型。

sentences.en: It is useful to classify all these particles into two groups.
sentences.cn: 把所有粒子分成两大类是适当的.

sentences.en: Kohlberg would classify them as having an individualistic morality.
sentences.cn: Kohlberg把他们归类为:拥有个人的道德价值观.

sentences.en: Language helps us to classify and put things in categories.
sentences.cn: 语言有助于将各类问题区别分类.

sentences.en: Men in the post office classify mail according to places it is to go.
sentences.cn: 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类.

sentences.en: To perform the Quality rating to classify the Supplier level.
sentences.cn: 实施质量分级,按供应商水平分类.

sentences.en: We usually classify types of character as good or bad.
sentences.cn: 我们通常把(人的)性格之类型分为善与恶.

sentences.en: We will classify these subjects under three topics.
sentences.cn: 我们将把这些问题分成三个主题.
我们把德拉布尔的小说归类为“言情小说”。

words.tran_cn: [测][遥感] 分类器；分类者；分类词

trans.tran_en: to decide what group something belongs to
to decide what group something belongs to
